app/app.config.ts:
import { ApplicationConfig } from '@angular/core';

 export const appConfig: ApplicationConfig = { providers: [], };
app.component.html:
<style>
.control-section{
    margin-top: 100px;
}
</style>
<style>

    @font-face {
    font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
    src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
    }

    .e-ddb-icons {
        font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
        speak: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-variant: normal;
        text-transform: none;
        line-height: 1;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    }
    .e-basic::before {
        content: "\e726";
    }

    .e-flow::before {
        content: "\e724";
    }

    .e-diagram-connector::before {
        content: "\e725";
    }

    .diagram-symbolpalette .e-ddb-icons {
        font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
        speak: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-variant: normal;
        text-transform: none;
        line-height: 1;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    }
    /* Icon css in dropdown */
    .diagram-symbolpalette .e-basic::before {
        content: "\e726";
    }

    .diagram-symbolpalette .e-flow::before {
        content: "\e724";
    }

    .diagram-symbolpalette .e-connector::before {
        content: "\e725";
    }
    .diagram-symbolpalette {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap; /* Allows columns to stack when zoomed/shrunk */
        width: 100%;
    }
   /* Base styles for columns */
    .diagram-column {
        min-height: 600px; /* Example height */
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }
     .diagram-column {
        padding-right: 10px;
     }

    #symbolpalette, #diagram {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border: 1px solid #ccc;
    }
    .palette-column {
        flex: 1 1 170px; /* Grow, Shrink, Basis */
        min-width: 170px;
    }

    .diagram-column {
        flex: 3 1 500px;
        min-width: 400px;
    }

    .property-panel-header {
        padding-left: 10px; 
        padding-top:  0px;
        font-weight: 500;
    }
    .property-panel-section {
        flex: 1 1 200px;
        min-width: 180px;
    }
    .property-panel-content table tr td:first-child {
        width: 50%;
    }
    .property-panel-content table tr td div {
        padding-top: 18px;
        padding-bottom: 15px;
    }
    .property-panel-content {
        overflow: auto;
        min-width:22%
    }
    .e-dropdownlist, .e-numeric {
        padding-top: 5px;
    }
</style>
 <div style="width: 100%; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom:20px" class="diagram-symbolpalette">
    <div class="palette-column"  style="min-width: 20%;" >
        <div class="sb-mobile-palette-bar">
            <div id="palette-icon" style="float: right;" role="button" class="e-ddb-icons1 e-toggle-palette"></div>
        </div>
        <ejs-symbolpalette #symbolpalette id="symbolpalette" [enableAnimation]='enableAnimation' [enableSearch]='enableSearch' [expandMode]='expandMode' [palettes]='palettes'
            width="100%" height="900px" [symbolMargin]='symbolMargin' [getSymbolInfo]='getSymbolInfo'
            [getNodeDefaults]='getSymbolDefaults' [getConnectorDefaults]='getConnectorDefaults'>
        </ejs-symbolpalette>
    </div>

    <div  id="diagram-space" class="diagram-column">
        <ejs-diagram #diagram id="diagram" width="100%" height="900px" (created)="created()" [getNodeDefaults]='getNodeDefaults'
        [scrollSettings] = "scrollSettings">
        </ejs-diagram>
    </div>

    <div class="property-panel-section">
        <div class="property-panel-header">Properties</div>
        <div class="property-panel-content">
            <table id="property" class="property-panel-table" title="Properties" style="width: 100%;height:100%;">
                <tbody>
                    <tr style="height: 50px">
                        <td>
                            <div>
                                Expandable
                            </div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                            <div>
                                <ejs-dropdownlist id="expand1" #expand [dataSource]="expandOptions" [fields]=fields index=1 width="100px" (change)="onExpandChange($event)"></ejs-dropdownlist>
                            </div>
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                    <tr style="height: 50px">
                        <td>
                            <div>
                                Symbol Size
                            </div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                            <div>
                                <ejs-numerictextbox #size id="size" value="50" step="5" format="##.##" min="40" max="90" width="100px" (change)='onSizeChange($event)'></ejs-numerictextbox>
                            </div>
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                    <tr style="height: 70px">
                        <td>
                            <div style="padding-top: 14px;">
                                Animation
                            </div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                            <div style="padding-top: 9px;">
                            <ejs-checkbox #animation id="animation" [checked]="true" (change)="onAnimationChange($event)"></ejs-checkbox>
                            </div>
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                    <tr style="height: 70px;">
                        <td>
                            <div style="padding-top: 14px;">
                                Item Text
                            </div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                            <div style="padding-top: 9px;">
                                <ejs-checkbox id="itemtext" [checked]="false" (change)="onItemTextChange($event)"></ejs-checkbox>
                            </div>
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                    <tr style="height: 70px;">
                        <td>
                            <div style="padding-top: 14px;">
                                Header Icon
                            </div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                            <div style="padding-top: 9px;">
                                <ejs-checkbox id="headerIcon" [checked]="true" (change)="onHeaderIconChange($event)"></ejs-checkbox>
                            </div>
                        </td>
                    </tr>

                    <tr style="height: 70px;">
                        <td>
                            <div style="padding-top: 14px;">
                                Show Search TextBox
                            </div>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                            <div style="padding-top: 9px;">
                            <ejs-checkbox id="showsearch" [checked]="true" (change)="onShowSearchChange($event)"></ejs-checkbox>
                            </div>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
